website_summaries.verdict: This is a great product for those struggling with parasites and those who have trouble swallowing pills.
pros: Liquid supplement with a 1/2 teaspoon dose per day
May help to promote weight loss and a healthy metabolism
cons: Not everyone enjoys the taste of the supplement

customer_reviews.title: Brought me back to health
customer_reviews.text: I'm on day 10 and am feeling better then I have in a long time. Around the third day I felt flu like symptoms but it was due to the toxins leaving my body. I still see evidence of it working in my stool. I will be purchasing another three week dose soon and plan to do this yearly.
customer_reviews.author: caroljordan2

customer_reviews.title: Really works.. Tastes great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! Came back from vacation with the worst GI illness. Took antibiotics but something was still very wrong. Even submitted samples for culture but docs didn't find anything. Had all the typical symptoms of a parasite. Constipation, skin rash, teeth grinding, night sweats. After taking this for just one week I knew it was working. I'll spare you the details. But this product has the two number one ingredients for killing parasites... Black walnut hull and wormwood. Plus it has a great taste! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: jmi

customer_reviews.title: Superior!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from poor digestion, nausea and a sensitive stomach for years. I eat a very clean, raw vegan diet and have been perplexed on what can be causing my issues. I have recently discovered the healing power of herbs and this product has moved mountains for me. I have been noticing significant improvement daily and will continue using this product, as well as other Go Nutrients products for their superior quality and efficiency. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but glad I took a gamble on it
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical of this item, but glad I took a gamble on it. Best my stomach has felt in years. Took bloat away. Lost 10 lbs in about a week and a half. I highly recommend this cleanse
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I would say first and foremost the customer service is outstanding. When I noticed a discrepancy between the amount needed to complete the two 3 week cycles written online vs what I was personally experiencing they refunded a portion of my purchase price and offered further refund for the future bottles I would have to purchase. Very considerate. The product itself is actually delicious. I wasn’t sure based on other reviews re: the taste, but it is super easy to digest. I am 15 days on and have noticed improved digestion, elimination, and less belly bloat. I still have another week on the first round, and need to complete the second course of treatment. But so far I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E|Mc|G

customer_reviews.title: It DOES work!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing stuff for me! I had no idea how ill I was for so long until I tried this. My stomach was always bloated, it hurt to bend over. Not in my muscles, but in my gut. I took this for about 3 weeks, and my entire body feels different. No bloat, no pain, and clearer headed, too.

customer_reviews.title: Intestinal Edge - High Potency
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bottles of Intestinal Edge on July 9, 2019, delivery was fast two days, I had skin irritations, rash break outs for some years now, doctor prescriptions didn't work for me. I started doing my own research on youtube videos , Black walnut and wormwood is the key ingredients, searched on amazon read lots of reviews and I was convinced of the product, I followed the instructions, I've been taking it a month now and WOW! it works! No irritations I notice the irritation and my rash was drying up and slowly disappearing. The taste is great! I put two full droppings in a cold water twice a day mornings and evenings, I truly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Works and tastes great!

I first did a lot of research and talked with health professionals and people who have benefitted from various liver cleansing methods. Reading a lot of labels, I settled on this brand. I followed the instructions. It worked well, did not cause me digestive distress, and tastes great! Together with some supplements and other natural remedies, it has really helped me feel better.

We know how important it is to keep a healthy gut, but from time to time your body needs to rid itself of harmful organisms. This is a very gentle product that crushes parasites that zap your energy. I mix this with cold water 3 times a day for a few days and I feel like myself again after a few hours.

customer_reviews.text: I love Intestinal Edge. Using this, I saw a difference in my energy level, which had been very low. It was physically hard to get through the day. After three weeks on Intestinal Edge my energy level improved. An unexpected side benefit is my allergies decreased. I'm not sure why. Perhaps there was a parasite causing an allergic over reaction. At any rate, this is easy to take, doesn't taste bad, and I feel so much better!

customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad because he was having constipation and bloating issues. He absolutely loves it and says its helped him incredibly! Works quickly as well

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm rarely moved to write reviews, but this product really deserves it. My stomach is usually pretty tough and I can bounce back from food poisoning in a day or two. But on a recent trip abroad, I ate contaminated food that left me sick for a solid week with no improvement in sight. I took this product twice a day. Within the first day, I noticed an improvement - the worst of my symptoms were gone. By the second day, I felt pretty good but noticed some slight headaches/die-off symptoms and made sure to drink extra water. By the third day, I was feeling almost totally normal. Next time I'm traveling, I'll take the bottle with me!

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting product for pinworms
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of sushi so I'm always afraid I have worms when I start to itch down there. I always cleanse using a different product but it was too costly and didn't go down well (too thick and weird flavor). After trying the intestinal edge, I will not go back to the other product. This tasted way better and isn't thick. It also has multiple doses unlike the other one that only has one and keeps me wondering if it actually worked or if I had to buy it again.

The taste is okay, not bad, but not good either. I only wish I could find it in a bigger bottle.

I am almost 3 weeks in and feel great! :) My stomach hurt slightly the first day or so, but nothing crazy. I have an under active thyroid, so this product was interesting to me, since I often times feel sluggish. I look forward to finished the first 3 weeks and starting my second series, after a week off. I even recommended the product to my mother....keep up the good work! :)

Unlike other reviews thankfully I dont notice anything moving or parasitic in nature coming out of me but it really started cleaning me out. It is black, like motor oil, so I was hesitant to take it straight but I went ahead and was pleasantly surprised by the taste. Another reviewer mentioned a pumpkin pie flavor and he nailed it, its almost nutmeg-ey but really not bad, certainly not as bad as the hemp oil I have used in the past. Reccomend

I don’t use it as much but I know if I were to use it it would definitely do a huge clean up. Worth the buy if you’re experiencing gut issues/parasites. Also try fasting and using this for a real good clean up. Drinking a lots of water and eating organic fruits.

customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not an overnight success but this does work
customer_reviews.text: Take on an empty stomach and drink at least one 8oz glass of water after. Hydrate during the day. I took this first thing in the morning and did not eat/drink anything else for about the 1/2 to 1 hour it took me to get ready to walk out the door for work. I saw best results in limiting intake of sugar and anything that will convert to sugar in my body. I've been taking for 3 weeks and noticed this worked for me. However, if you are taking any RX meds, you may need to consult your doctor before using this because of possible interactions.

customer_reviews.title: Without going into disgusting detail, this stuff works

Days 2 and 3 were rough, felt like I had a bad flu, slept a whole bunch, etc. Glad I got through it, because it's worth it. Highly recommended, nice vendor.

Also made my skin smell garlicky for the first few days..or I just eat a lot of garlic and my pores were trying to rid my body of toxins so that came out too. Tip: avoid garlic while doing this cleanse!

product_meta.title: Intestinal Edge - High Potency Digestive Support & Cleanse for Humans with Black Walnut Hull, Wormwood and etc - 2 oz
feature_bullets: GET PEACE OF MIND - Get rid of those pesky invaders and feel better or your money back! Also, it is safe for adults and kids.
GET THE #1 CHOICE for supporting a healthy balance of intestinal microflora in your digestive tract. It is the ultimate natural blend for adults and kids.

8 POWERHOUSE NATURAL PLANTS AND EXTRACTS: engineered by our select team of herbalists and naturopaths using some of the world’s most biodiverse healing plants including Black Walnut Hull, Cloves, Gentian Root, Wormwood and more

EASY AND CONVENIENT LIQUID DROPS: No more swallowing pills! Our product is readily absorbed, digested, and assimilated by the body to assure optimal benefit. Most pills contain fillers, binders and/or other materials that take much longer to digest
ABOUT GO NUTRIENTS PRODUCTS: Our products are formulated in a GMP compliant facility, third party tested for purity, made in the USA and are NSF-certified. Plus, they 100% alcohol free
